metadata.title: Top 5 Qualities of Successful Data Scientists! | by Bharath K | Towards Data Science
metadata.h1: Top 5 Qualities of Successful Data Scientists!
metadata.description: Data Science is a wonderful field of study that poses the requirement of some necessary traits to succeed in this particular area and achieve the best possible results. We have all heard about it…

all_paragraphs: Data Science is a wonderful field of study that poses the requirement of some necessary traits to succeed in this particular area and achieve the best possible results.

We have all heard about it numerous times that data science is the current and future of job marketing, and that is most certainly true for the most part. There are tons of opportunities and a tremendous scope available for well-educated practitioners of data science and machine learning.

Technical skills are obviously an essential aspect of any field and a significant requirement to be successful in the practice of any discipline. But what are the unique traits to be a successful data scientist?

After interacting and having a closer look at how data scientists work, I have determined the 5 most important qualities to succeed as a data scientist, in my opinion. Let us analyze each of these aspects sequentially.

An extremely useful attribute that an exceptional data scientist posses are the quality to solve complex tasks by adapting to the modern or unique techniques for achieving the best possible results as well as being creative to solve the job and finish it with lower space and time complexity, i.e., effectively completing the work with high efficiency as fast as possible consuming the least resources available.

Every task to be solved by a data scientist is unique in its own way, and these complex tasks have various solutions and hence, even the best ways to solve them will differ accordingly. Therefore, adaptability is an essential aspect of producing the best results.

Creative, critical, and analytical thinking are some of the most intriguing characteristics of a data scientist. The ability to think outside the box and implement innovative ideas is a necessary and requirement for a successful data scientist to perform. These attributes are some of the key aspects of performing outstandingly on an industry level.

Effective interaction is a key concept for most things in life and also in most jobs as well. Especially in data science, communication skills play a key role. To perform a complex project efficiently while coordinating and communicating effectively is a must requirement for every data scientist.

A data scientist must acquire the ability to listen carefully to the instructions provided by the supervisor, the employee, or anyone else. Once you finish listening, it is essential to process the information and communicate effectively by conveying your statements and thoughts through intense, meaningful, and thoughtful exchanges.
You are also able to guide your teammates, coordinate effectively, and work with your crewmates on the particular task at hand. We will cover more about this part in detail in the upcoming section.

More often than not, big data science projects require a group of functional, active, and effectively data scientists to perform a particular business venture or task with utmost efficiency. It is so essential for them to provide the best service to their employees by producing high-quality models for the specific project.

Working together as a team is significant because there needs to be a consistent exchange of information on the ongoing project. And hence, this work requires data scientists to work collectively to figure out the best possible solutions, improve the model accuracy, and produce top-quality results during deployment.

The most interesting part of data science projects to me is building machine learning or deep learning models and making sure they work perfectly and feel good about it. Then, deploy those models built once they are meeting the appropriate requirements.

However, a large part of Data Science is actually dealing with the data at hand. Most of the data available naturally on the web is not clean. A lot of cleansing and pre-processing must be done for the extraction of useful data. Most complex tasks require critical analysis and computational processing to obtain desirable outcomes. Persistence is extremely important in every scenario especially in the field of data science.

Even experts in this field make mistakes and have to look up stuff for solving certain questions. This field is probably one of the only ones where you don’t have to mug up a lot of things as you can use Google for things you forget.
However, that is totally fine because it is all just a learning experience, and persevering through it will result in you blossoming into a better data scientist.

The ability to process the complex situations of computational tasks and assess the quality that will be produced by various models is extremely important at the industry level. Hence, strong decisions must be made on what are the best choices and best resources available for solving the complex tasks at hand.

Just to state a couple of simple examples, let us consider a machine learning task where you are able to find out that Support Vector machines (SVMs) are performing a particular task with a 97%, while a machine learning algorithm like logistic regression is able to perform the same task with a 98% accuracy. The data scientist must be able to determine the best choice for him for each particular task.

Expanding this example further to deep learning and neural networks, the data scientist is able to switch between deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or Pytorch accordingly, for whichever is best suitable for the task at hand.
These are obviously some simple examples. However, the decision-making ability of a data scientist is extremely crucial for expanding thoughts exponentially, resulting in better outcomes.

These five unique traits and qualities are the most essential characteristics that a data scientist must possess to achieve the best possible results and a high amount of success in the respective field. In this article, we covered and discussed why these attributes are important.

Technical skills are just as essential and a compulsory requirement. Basic knowledge and a deep understanding of the subject guarantees a genuine approach to find detailed solutions to tasks at hand. However, in my opinion, these unique are an absolute must to last longer and have long-term success.
Check out some of my other articles that you might enjoy reading!
Thank you all for sticking on till the end. I hope you guys enjoyed reading this article. I wish you all have a wonderful day ahead!
Your home for data science. A Medium publication sharing concepts, ideas and codes.
Love to explore and learn new concepts. Extremely interested in AI, deep learning, robots, and the universe. LinkedIn — www.linkedin.com/in/bharath-k-421090194
